function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of proper lighting and ventilation in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of green spaces and natural elements in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate protection from contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate natural light in indoor environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene maintenance in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Touching switch, button, doorknobs, and surfaces in a shared building can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate placement of wash basins and hand sanitizers can lead to poor hygiene and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large distance between entry and wash area in apartment floor plans can facilitate the spread of germs and viruses, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of physical separation in workspace","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and natural light","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shared workspaces lacking visual indicators","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate relaxation space for mental and physical health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of poor neighborhood hygiene","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unhygienic condition of the neighbourhood leading to the spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risk in common areas such as stairwells, lifts, and parking lots of buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confined and enclosed spaces causing poor ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission risk of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 across multiple countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economic recession and mental health problems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific treatment or vaccine for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortcomings of lockdown measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of job loss due to lockdown of non-essential organizations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented use of digital transformation technologies may lead to ineffective response to covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing and scaling digital transformation technologies for covid-19 response","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of data security and privacy breaches with the use of digital transformation technologies in covid-19 response","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of widespread population testing for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented data sources and solutions for covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited amount of data for forecasting new covid-19 cases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weekly forecasts of total deaths and hospitalization for the usa","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Digital contact tracing systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on robotics for infectious disease control","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid implementation of virtual clinics in response to covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of data sources of existing digital transformation technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of digital transformation technologies without holistic management","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of governmental data including health records poses a risk of privacy breaches and data misuse.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal private data sources raises the risk of data exposure and unauthorized use.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of unauthorized access to private health records due to the use of digital technologies.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for misdiagnosis due to inaccuracies in ai and machine learning models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of data privacy and security breaches from the use of iot devices and mobile applications","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for over-reliance on telemedicine and remote monitoring, leading to missed or delayed physical examinations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapidly developing drugs and vaccines for covid-19 by utilization of robots and cps technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Helping hospitalized patients in transporting and serving food or medicines by robots","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing unique treatment protocol for each patient and identifying patients with a higher possibility of developing severe symptoms based on their initial symptoms as a result of the utilization of ai and big data technology for analyzing patients’ historical health records and response to current treatment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Offering extensive healthcare services as monitoring patients’ health in a real-time manner and tracking their medicine use periodically by the integration of smart medical devices with iomt technology.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai-powered applications for risk forecasting, simulation, and modeling of covid-19 spread may have inaccuracies leading to misinformed decisions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing iot, mobile, and surveillance camera data for tracing and warning about social distancing and wearing masks may infringe upon privacy rights and lead to surveillance concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation, myths, and conspiracy theories about covid-19 spread through ai on social media","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data security and privacy measures for the collected health data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to public health measures due to surveillance and tracking methods","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of autonomous robots for disinfection leading to improper disinfection or safety hazards","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
